data_table.description: Visit 5. Subject ID, date of flair scan, region number and name, white matter hyperintensity, and cortical and subcortical infarct of participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: MRW7
variable.description: White matter hyperintensity / total at risk white matter - WMH_percentage

variable.name: MRW3Y
variable.description: Year of date of flair scan - scan_date
